titles.title: To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate California State Route 99 as a high priority corridor on the National Highway System.
To amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to designate California State Route 99 as a high priority corridor on the National Highway System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways, Transit and Pipelines.

bill.summary: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to add the California State Route 99 from south of Bakersfield to Sacramento, California, (California Farm-to-Market Corridor) to the high priority corridors of the national highway system.
